EmailTemplate.name: New Registration With Medical Needs
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Family_Member_Attendance__c.Contact__c} registered with medical needs
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear RPC,
The following child has registered {!Family_Member_Attendance__c.Contact__c} ({!Family_Member_Attendance__c.Id}) for {!Family_Member_Attendance__c.Event__c} and requires a medical form or to bring a signed management plan/webster pack.
Thanks,
Camp Quality.
